Scanner.Name: Windows Defender Information
Scanner.FileName: C:\PowerShell-Scanners\PowerShell Scanners\Windows Defender Information\Windows Defender Information.ps1

ScanProfile.Description: Gathers basic Windows Defender Information such as product version and signature version using the built-in cmdlet 'Get-MpComputerStatus' found in the defender module.
ScanProfile.Name: PS - Windows Defender Information
